creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: Arm rest of white jade.  Carved with eagle on rock representing heroism; also peach tree with fruit, representing long life.  Inscription of one line meaning 'Peach of Three Thousand Years'.  Poem of four lines on reverse.  Tray for a scholar ink stone and ink.
title: Ink Bed
